docs.lead_paragraph: tion to boast that I tell you here of some of the people I know, though their names will not be mentioned for obvious reasons. For instance, I know somebody who can sell you drugs that will blast your mind back to the Stone Age and leave it there whimpering. You would rather have a gun? No problem. If the light firepower available at the roadside stand isn't good enough, I know somebody who can put you in touch with stuff big enough to knock over a Central American government. You meet people like these in the newspaper business.

byline.original: By Russell Baker IT IS WITH NO INTEN
